General_extensionDescription.message: Assign a proxy to a container

ContainerList_privateBrowsingContainerNa.description: Name of container for private browsing window

OptionsNavigation_assign.description: Navigation link title for assign proxy for containers

OptionsNavigation_proxies.description: Navigation link title for config proxy list

OptionsNavigation_support.description: Navigation link title for support information page

ContainerList_proxyDisabled.description: Config containers to use Firefox's proxy preferences

ProxyForm_doNotProxyLocalFieldLabel.description: `Do not proxy local addresses` field in the proxy form

ProxyForm_proxyDnsFieldLabel.description: `Proxy DNS requests` field in the proxy form

ProxyForm_incorrectServerError.message: Value should be either IP address or domain name
ProxyForm_incorrectServerError.description: Error message displayed when incorrect server is entered

ProxyForm_testProxySettingsConfirmationT.message: To test settings it is required to make a couple of requests to $DUCKDUCKGO_NAME$. Proceed?
ProxyForm_testProxySettingsConfirmationT.description: Text shown when a user clicks Test settings button notifying user about request to 3rd party service

ProxyForm_testProxySettingsLabel.description: Settings test button label in proxy form

ProxyForm_duckduckgoAttribution.description: Attribution to DuckDuckGo for IP query

ProxySettingsTestResult_settingsAreCorre.description: Text displayed when result of testing proxy settings was successful in proxy form

ProxySettingsTestResult_error.description: Generic text meaning there is an error

ProxySettingsTestResult_notConnectedToTh.message: Error! Probably, you are not connected to the Internet.
ProxySettingsTestResult_notConnectedToTh.description: Text displayed when both direct and proxied requests failed to succeed

ProxySettingsTestResult_noDirectConnecti.message: The settings are correct, but it seems connecting to the Internet without a proxy is not possible.
ProxySettingsTestResult_noDirectConnecti.description: Text displayed when proxied request succeeded, but direct request failed

ProxySettingsTestResult_incorrectSetting.message: Error! Could not connect to the proxy. Probably the settings are incorrect.
ProxySettingsTestResult_incorrectSetting.description: Text displayed when direct request is successful, but proxied request failed

SupportPage_gitterInvite.message: If you have any questions, have a problem or just want to chat you are welcome in our channel in $GITTER_NAME$:
SupportPage_gitterInvite.description: Gitter welcome message displayed on Support page

ImportPage_foxyProxyInputLabel.description: Label of FoxyProxy settings file input

ImportPage_importButtonNoFileSelected.description: Text displayed on Import button when no file is selected or the file is invalid

ImportPage_importButtonDoImport.description: Text displayed on Import button when there is something to import
